patthana4.3:1.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo ca abyākato sappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:2.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:3.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:4.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sappaccayañca abyākataṃ sappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:5.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sappaccayañca abyākataṃ sappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:6.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.3:7.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.3:8.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:9.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:10.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:11.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:12.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre …pe… namagge ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte tīṇi …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:16.1.pli: Kusalo sappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:17.1.pli: Akusalo sappaccayo dhammo akusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:18.1.pli: Abyākato sappaccayo dhammo abyākatassa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:19.1.pli: Kusalo sappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:20.1.pli: Akusalo sappaccayo dhammo akusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:21.1.pli: Abyākato sappaccayo dhammo abyākatassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:22.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:27.1.pli: Kusalaṃ saṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sappaccayadukasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.3:28.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:29.1.pli: Akusalaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:33.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anidassano dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.3:34.1.pli: Akusalaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo anidassano dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.3:35.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassano dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:36.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:37.1.pli: Akusalaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo anidassano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:38.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:39.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.3:40.1.pli: Kusalo anidassano dhammo kusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:41.1.pli: Akusalo anidassano dhammo akusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:42.1.pli: Abyākato anidassano dhammo abyākatassa anidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:43.1.pli: Kusalo anidassano dhammo kusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:44.1.pli: Akusalo anidassano dhammo akusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:45.1.pli: Abyākato anidassano dhammo abyākatassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:46.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta …pe… upanissaye nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:48.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:51.1.pli: Kusalaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:52.1.pli: Akusalaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:53.1.pli: Abyākataṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:59.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:60.1.pli: Akusalaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:62.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:64.1.pli: Kusalo appaṭigho dhammo kusalassa appaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:65.1.pli: Akusalo appaṭigho dhammo akusalassa appaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:66.1.pli: Abyākato appaṭigho dhammo abyākatassa appaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:67.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.3:68.1.pli: Abyākataṃ rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:69.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:71.1.pli: Kusalaṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:72.1.pli: Akusalaṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:73.1.pli: Abyākataṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:74.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ, avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:75.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… navipāke tīṇi, najhāne nakamme ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:77.1.pli: Kusalo arūpī dhammo kusalassa arūpissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:78.1.pli: Akusalo arūpī dhammo akusalassa arūpissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:79.1.pli: Abyākato arūpī dhammo abyākatassa arūpissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:80.1.pli: Kusalo arūpī dhammo kusalassa arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:81.1.pli: Akusalo arūpī dhammo akusalassa arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:82.1.pli: Abyākato arūpī dhammo abyākatassa arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:83.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:85.1.pli: Kusalaṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo lokiyo ca abyākato lokiyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:87.1.pli: Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:88.1.pli: Kusalaṃ lokiyañca abyākataṃ lokiyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:89.1.pli: Akusalaṃ lokiyañca abyākataṃ lokiyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:90.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:91.1.pli: Akusalaṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:92.1.pli: Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:93.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.3:94.1.pli: Kusalo lokiyo dhammo kusalassa lokiyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:96.1.pli: Abyākato lokiyo dhammo abyākatassa lokiyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:97.1.pli: Kusalo lokiyo dhammo kusalassa lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:98.1.pli: Akusalo lokiyo dhammo akusalassa lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:99.1.pli: Abyākato lokiyo dhammo abyākatassa lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:100.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.3:101.1.pli: Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:102.1.pli: Abyākataṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:103.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… āsevane vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:104.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā dve …pe… naāsevane nakamme navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:106.1.pli: Kusalo lokuttaro dhammo kusalassa lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:107.1.pli: Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo abyākatassa lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:110.1.pli: Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo abyākatassa lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo kusalassa lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.3:112.1.pli: Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo abyākatassa lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:113.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:115.1.pli: Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo ca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:116.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:117.1.pli: Abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:118.1.pli: Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyañca abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:119.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyañca abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.3:120.1.pli: Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.3:121.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.3:123.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:126.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.3:127.1.pli: Kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo kusalassa kenaci viññeyyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:130.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.3:132.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Kenaciviññeyyasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.4:1.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:4.1.pli: Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo ca abyākato noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:5.1.pli: Akusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:6.1.pli: Abyākataṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:7.1.pli: Kusalaṃ noāsavañca abyākataṃ noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:8.1.pli: Akusalaṃ noāsavañca abyākataṃ noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:9.1.pli: Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.4:10.1.pli: Akusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.4:11.1.pli: Abyākataṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:12.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:13.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.4:14.1.pli: Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:15.1.pli: Akusalo noāsavo dhammo akusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:16.1.pli: Abyākato noāsavo dhammo abyākatassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:17.1.pli: Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:18.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.4:19.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:20.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:21.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:22.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sāsavañca abyākataṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:23.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sāsavañca abyākataṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:24.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:25.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:27.1.pli: Kusalo sāsavo dhammo kusalassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:28.1.pli: Akusalo sāsavo dhammo akusalassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:29.1.pli: Abyākato sāsavo dhammo abyākatassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:30.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:32.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:33.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:34.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:36.1.pli: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:37.1.pli: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:38.1.pli: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:39.1.pli: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:40.1.pli: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Abyākato anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:41.1.pli: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:42.1.pli: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:43.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.4:44.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:45.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:47.1.pli: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto ca abyākato āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:48.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:49.1.pli: Abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:50.1.pli: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttañca abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:51.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavavippayuttañca abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:52.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā satta …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:54.1.pli: Kusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:55.1.pli: Akusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:56.1.pli: Abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:57.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate dasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:59.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:60.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:62.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:63.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:64.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:65.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca abyākataṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:66.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca abyākataṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:67.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:69.1.pli: Kusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo kusalassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:70.1.pli: Akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo akusalassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:71.1.pli: Abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo abyākatassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:72.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.4:73.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:74.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:76.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:77.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:79.1.pli: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:80.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:81.1.pli: Abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:82.1.pli: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:83.1.pli: Akusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:84.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:86.1.pli: Kusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:87.1.pli: Akusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:88.1.pli: Abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:89.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate dasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.4:90.1.pli: Kusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:91.1.pli: Abyākataṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:92.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:94.1.pli: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:95.1.pli: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:96.1.pli: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:97.1.pli: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:98.1.pli: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:99.1.pli: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:100.1.pli: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:101.1.pli: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:102.1.pli: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:103.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.4:106.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… akusalaṃ ganthaṃ … oghaṃ … yogaṃ … nīvaraṇaṃ ….

patthana4.4:107.1.pli: Kusalaṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Āsavagocchakasadisaṃ.) Diṭṭhiṃ paṭicca diṭṭhi na uppajjati.
